data.name: command_description_short
data.value: Makes current target your focus target when there is no current focus target

data.name: command_description_long
data.value: Makes current target your focus target when there is no current focus target. Alias: /cft

data.name: announcement_unchanged_pvp
data.comment: Chat message that gets posted on command execution if the focus target wasn't changed due to the player being in PvP

data.name: announcement_changed
data.comment: Chat message that gets posted on command execution if the focus target was changed

data.name: announcement_unchanged
data.comment: Chat message that gets posted on command execution if the focus target wasn't changed

data.name: settings_lang_dropdown_auto
data.comment: Top option in the Settings window's Language drop-down that will dynamically set the plugin's language to match Dalamud's display language

data.name: settings_lang_contribute_tooltip
data.value: You can help out with translation over at GitHub {githubLink}
data.comment: Tooltip that shows when hovering the Contribute button in the Settings window

data.name: settings_lang_contribute_button
data.comment: Button that opens the Localisation Contribution section of the Readme on GitHub

data.name: settings_lang_dropdown_label
data.comment: Label for the Language drop-down in the Settings window

data.name: settings_chat_announce_title
data.value: Announce focus change in chat window:

data.name: settings_lang_credits
data.value: Translated by: ENTER YOUR NAME HERE
data.comment: You may credit yourself here. If there were other translators before you, do not remove their name. If possible, please keep names in alphabetical order and separated by a comma (or regional equivalents).
